Summary: Bubble raised up over small hill & continued on up valley looking like disc in the distance
trends: There have been 185 other sightings in Denver
There were no other sightings in Denver on or around June 6th 2005
divs: Sighting Details- Saw UFO Denver 2005 when visiting (looked like a floating bubble to start with) - had MUFON lunch - but right now would someone please send some information regarding the MUFON Symposium October before last in Denver. It was regarding ET's etc now as in not UFO's anymore but IFO's and identifiable entities, etc. - Sheldan Nidle was one of the speakers. - Am interested in DVD's tapes, etc too with thanks AvB
